row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.JOB.DOWNLOAD_ARTIFACT@GENERIC
row.description: Download file and handle its source path

row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS_IN_URL@WINDOWS : SET &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS_IN_URL@WINDOWS : SET &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#http-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROTOCOL#" ? -h "&UC4RB_HTTP_URL#" -p "&UC4RB_HTTP_PORT#" -u "&UC4RB_HTTP_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_HTTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE#" -tgt "&UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o "&UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -to "&UC4RB_HTTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" -ph "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_HOST#" -pp "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_PORT#" ? -pu "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_USER#" -ppwd "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_PWD#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
: INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS_IN_URL@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_HTTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS_IN_URL@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#http-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROTOCOL#" ? -h "&UC4RB_HTTP_URL#" -p "&UC4RB_HTTP_PORT#" -u "&UC4RB_HTTP_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_HTTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_HTTP_SOURCE#" -tgt "&UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o "&UC4RB_HTTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -to "&UC4RB_HTTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" -ph "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_HOST#" -pp "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_PORT#" ? -pu "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_USER#" -ppwd "&UC4RB_HTTP_PROXY_PWD#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*=>*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &FROM# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &COPYING_ROW# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&FROM#, "Copying") : IF &COPYING_ROW# = "Y" : SET &FROM# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&FROM#, "Copying", "") : DEFINE &SPLITTED_ARR#, string, 2 : FILL &SPLITTED_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&FROM#,"=::=") : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&SPLITTED_ARR#[1]) : SET &FROM# = &SPLITTED_ARR#[2] : SET &FROM# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&FROM#, "'", "") : SET &FROM# = STR_TRIM(&FROM#) : IF &ARTIFACT_NAME# <> "" : SET &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = STR_ENDS_WITH (&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "md5") : IF &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = "N" : SET &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = STR_ENDS_WITH (&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "sha1") : IF &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = "N" : PUT_VAR &UC4RB_HTTP_VARA_NAME#, &ARTIFACT_NAME#, "", &FROM# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
